ygData.subject: RE: see invis? I don't see it......
ygData.msgSnippet: yes that s correct, our enchanters do drain now on dragon raids, but our song is nothing in comparison. Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard Tyria Sarkin, L39
ygData.messageBody:
yes that's correct, our enchanters do drain now on dragon raids, but our
song is nothing in comparison.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L39 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Word I'm getting (indirectly) is that the latest enchanter
> strategy on Vox runs is to stamina drain her so she can't get
> as many complete heals off. Vox (and probably Naggy) were
> changed so that they can't be stunned/bashed/mesmerized to
> interrupt their casting anymore.
>
> Dunno how our song compares to their spell, or even if it
> stacks.
